grails.plugin.multitenant.core
Interface Tenant

public interface Tenant

Most applications will have one domain class implementing this interface and the tenantId method will most likely return the database generated id to allow for fast lookups from second level cache.

Author:
Kim A. Betti

Method Summary
 Integer tenantId()
          This interface will often be implemented Grails domain classes.
 

Method Detail

tenantId

Integer tenantId()
This interface will often be implemented Grails domain classes. Naming this method by Java bean convention (getTenantId) will cause GORM to mistake it for a property and fail.

Returns:
tenant id, will often be a database PK
